name: G-MODEアーカイブス09 フライハイトクラウディア2
name_original: G-MODEアーカイブス09 フライハイトクラウディア2
description:
Fulfilling a promise made a long time ago, to a faraway place in the sky.



The long-awaited second installment in the series that picks up where the previous "Flyhight Cloudia" left off!
The world above the clouds, "Cloudia", and the world below the clouds, "Erdia".
Cloudia, the world above the clouds, and Erdia, the world below the clouds, and the various feelings that connect the two worlds begin to weave a new story...

In addition to the addition of a map display function to help you navigate the intricate dungeons and a pause function for event scenes to make the game more comfortable to play, this title also features a major upgrade to the unique "Multi-Weight Battle" battle system that was so popular in the previous title.
With the addition of attributes (fire/ice/lightning), a special skill system, and a formation system that separates the vanguard and rearguard, the flashy polygonal attack effects create a powerful battle.


■ About G-MODE Archives
The G-MODE Archives is a reissue project that faithfully recreates old feature phone games as they were back then.

In order to enjoy the app as it was back then, the web-connected menu, buttons, and keys have been transplanted, but some of them may not work.
For more information on the Steam version, press START button and see the "How to play" in the PAUSE menu.
